mng: Chinese mugwort or wormwood, moxa, to stop or cut short, phonetic "ai" or "i", abbr. for 艾滋病[ai4 zi1 bing4], AIDS

exm.mng: flourishing and still in the ascendant (idiom); rapidly expanding, still growing strong, on the up
AIDS (loanword), see also 愛滋病|爱滋病[ai4 zi1 bing4]
HIV, see also 愛滋病毒|爱滋病毒[ai4 zi1 bing4 du2]

exm.pyn: Bù yí nuò sī Ài lì sī

exm.mng: human immune deficiency virus (HIV), the AIDS virus
